::Skulletron/Sickle::

          Skulletron starts to regain vision, but, n=
ot enough.  He stumbles a bit more, then, he hit something, and fell on the=
 ground.  Everything went dark for a moment.  Skulletron was on the verge o=
f stasis lock.  Skulletron started seeing things he had never seen before. =
 Then, he awoke from this strange dream state.  He looked around, he was in=
 the Cybertronian Fire.  Skulletron's eyes then went a blood red.  He got u=
p, and growled.  He looked at the wall, and laughed.  Skulletron sent his f=
ist towards the wall, and did major damage to the wall.

         "Zardus..=
........You don't need them........They are fools...........Feline, Bloodys=
trike.................All of them..........We are superior...........Togeth=
er Zardus, you and I will dominate many galaxies............But, I must get=
 rid of the fools!!!!!!" He thought to himself. 

       Skulletron got pas=
t all the Maximals, and swiftly got out of the ship and away from it.  He t=
hen angrily started towards the Alliance base, running in beast mode on his=
 hyena legs.  The Alliance base was in sight.

          "I got here just i=
n time.......Now, I'll crush the fools!!!!!" He stomped into the base in ra=
ge.

       Skulletron went to Hot Rod's room, and growled.  He grabbed the=
 door, and ripped it off its hinges, and smashed it over his knee into two =
halves.  Skulletron's optics glowed red again, and he walked quickly over t=
o Hot Rod, and grabbed him by the neck with both hands, and lifted him off =
the ground.

           "Die you fool!!!!  Die!!!!!  Die!!!!!  DIE!!!!!!!!!=
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" Skulletron yelled in rage, squeezing Hot Rod's nec=
k, and shaking him like mad.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::=
Sickle::

         Sickle heard Zardus nearby.  Sickle had forgotten all ab=
out him since he left, and had went looking around.  Sickle floated off tow=
ards Zardus.

         "Hi, Zardus.  So, what've you been doing??" Sickle a=
sked, forming into a circle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::=
Phobia and the others could be heard.....They had moved::

::Dollen::

    =
   "Hey love, I can sense the others that way!!  Should we go meet up with =
them??" He said, faking a smile.
